dimensions: 2.2 inches high x 3.7 inches wide x 0.7 inches deep
zoom: 5x optical zoom lens has a focal length range of 25-125mm (35mm equivalent)
memory: Compatible with memory card microSD and microSDHC (up to 8GB)
interface: AV output, HDMI A (full size), micro USB, USB 2.0
display: Its equipped with dual LCD monitors
